name: Qixi
description:
Overcome opposing gravities together as you seek to destroy an abandoned heavenly station that spells doom for your peoples. 

Qixi is a two player puzzle platformer where players have opposing gravities. They must work together by swapping gravities to overcome the trials of the Temple In Between and bring balance back to their worlds.

Made at the NYU Game Center for Project Studio II

Credits:
Gordon Lee
Robert Rappoport
Mostafa Haque

with music by Dave Muto
